reviews.subject: Biology
reviews.review: Engaging lectures and helpful office hours. Tough but fair grading.

reviews.subject: Computer Science
reviews.review: Excellent at explaining complex concepts. Very approachable and supportive.

reviews.subject: Psychology
reviews.review: Interesting material, but lectures can be disorganized at times.

reviews.subject: History
reviews.review: Passionate about the subject. Assignments are challenging but rewarding.

reviews.subject: Chemistry
reviews.review: Clear explanations and well-structured labs. Always willing to help students.

reviews.subject: Economics
reviews.review: Lectures are dry and hard to follow. Exam questions often unclear.

reviews.subject: English Literature
reviews.review: Insightful discussions in class. Provides detailed feedback on essays.

reviews.subject: Physics
reviews.review: Knowledgeable, but sometimes struggles to explain concepts to non-majors.

reviews.subject: Sociology
reviews.review: Thought-provoking lectures. Creates an inclusive classroom environment.

reviews.subject: Mathematics
reviews.review: Patient and thorough. Provides plenty of practice problems and examples.

reviews.subject: Art History
reviews.review: Passionate and engaging. Field trips to museums were highlights of the course.

reviews.subject: Political Science
reviews.review: Knowledgeable but can be biased in presenting certain topics.

reviews.subject: Environmental Science
reviews.review: Incorporates current events into lectures. Group projects were valuable experiences.

reviews.subject: Philosophy
reviews.review: Challenges students to think critically. Facilitates great class discussions.

reviews.subject: Linguistics
reviews.review: Clear and organized teaching style. Assignments are relevant and interesting.

reviews.subject: Business Administration
reviews.review: Seems disinterested in teaching. Relies too heavily on textbook material.

reviews.subject: Anthropology
reviews.review: Brings real-world experience to the classroom. Encourages student participation.

reviews.subject: Engineering
reviews.review: Solid technical knowledge, but could improve on presentation skills.

reviews.subject: Music Theory
reviews.review: Patient and supportive. Makes complex theories accessible to all skill levels.

reviews.subject: Statistics
reviews.review: Knows the material well, but can be intimidating when students ask questions.
